transcript_chunks.text: i do not photoshop well so what i was going to do is just do this is this not what i should do the sides look weird right are you following that i don't know how to photoshop ww2k22 just unleashing a man to fold his head into four dimensions yeah but i would oh god yeah that works that works really well oh my god chad i could use some advice on how the you use this thing i don't really know what i'm doing here and i'm not having a good time i'm just gonna tweet out the face and say help help i think we could easily sell 50 of these so this it worked like i said it looks like you're wearing yourself as a mask
